title: How can I tell how strong my spiritual energy is?
description: Answer (1 of 6): The spiritual progress or maturity of a being, is based on how many experiences that particular incarnation has had in his lifetimes. Those on a lower rung of evolution, are likely to use their energies to accumulate, dominate and procreate! Soo are likened to "the beast" or our...
